short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mojha 1 Click SEO audit. Access a thorough analysis of your website's SEO performance right from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Mojha's 1-Click SEO Audit, a powerful extension that provides an in-depth analysis of your website's SEO performance directly from your browser. This extension serves as your comprehensive toolkit, offering insights across various dimensions:

Overview: Get a quick snapshot of your website's SEO landscape.

Suggestions: Receive tailored recommendations to enhance your SEO strategy.

Summary: Access a concise summary highlighting key aspects of your website's performance.

Meta-Spec: Dive into the specifics of your meta tags and ensure optimal representation.
SEO Analysis: Receive a detailed analysis of your website's SEO, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.

Page Quality: Evaluate the overall quality of your web pages and identify opportunities for refinement.

Server Config: Gain insights into your server configuration to ensure optimal performance.

Page Speed: Assess the speed of your pages and discover opportunities for optimization.

Optimization: Explore recommendations for optimizing various elements on your website.

With Mojha's 1-Click SEO Audit, empower yourself with a comprehensive understanding of your website's SEO health and take actionable steps towards boosting its performance.
